product_name: Mammut White Rose LTH - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: A lightweight backpacking boot that's built to go the distance, the Mammut White Rose LTH hiking boots offer plenty of coverage and support without weighing you down during long days on the trail. Durable, flexible leather uppers provide support and structure; secure lacing system ensures a snug, secure fit. White Rose hiking boots feature integrated motion control, designed to provide side-to-side stability without restricting flexibility. Memory foam insoles and EVA midsoles conform to your feet for a customized fit and comfortable cushioning. PD Cage sole technology delivers excellent arch support and distributes the force of impact throughout the outsole, ensuring all-day comfort. Mammut White Rose LTH hiking boots feature grippy rubber outsoles for reliable traction on uneven surfaces.
short_description: A lightweight backpacking boot that's built to go the distance, the Mammut White Rose LTH hiking boots offer plenty of coverage and support without weighing you down during long days on the trail.
